body.description: Vaseline Men's Healing Moisture Fast Absorbing Body Lotion has been specially formulated to hydrate and restore dry or cracked skin. This body lotion for men is formulated with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture. With daily exposure to environmental triggers (like wind, lack of humidity, and sun), skin's natural moisture barrier can break down, allowing water to escape the skin. But the Ultra-Hydrating lipids in our lotion fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture to allow the skin's natural barrier to recover. This lotion locks in moisture and promotes smooth, naturally glowing skin. The body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin). This lotion for dry skin absorbs fast and provides 48-hour moisture. Use this dermatologist-tested body lotion daily on dry, rough skin for stronger, noticeably healthier skin. Made of 50% recycled plastic, our ambition is to get to 100% recycled plastic in the near future. Since 2018, we've used 337 Metric Tons of recycled plastic across the Vaseline product portfolio in North America. Vaseline Men range works to heal dry skin from deep within. Vaseline has a range of products to help heal, soothe, and moisturize all skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vaseline Men’s Fast Absorbing Lotion is a 3-in-1 lotion suitable for face, body and hands. Our unique formula contains ultra-hydrating lipids and micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly to help heal dry skin. This daily non-greasy lotion for men goes on easy, absorbs within 15 seconds, and leaves skin feeling fresh and moisturized. This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin).

Fast Absorbing This lotion absorbs into your skin in 15 seconds to provide immediate moisturization without making your skin feel greasy. Hydrating Ingredients Our formula includes Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly that absorb deeply to moisturize and heal your skin from within. Feel the Difference This non-greasy body lotion provides 48-hour moisture. A Lotion for Every Skin Vaseline has a range of products to help heal, soothe and moisturize all skin types.

Vaseline Men Body Lotion Cooling, 20.3 oz Vaseline Men Hand & Body Lotion Extra Strength, 10 oz Vaseline Intensive Care Hand & Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Main Benefit Vaseline Men Cooling body lotion provides non-greasy healing moisture for healthy looking, resilient skin. This lotion's formula contains vitamin B3 and micro droplets of Vaseline Jelly, to keep dry hands and skin healed for 3 weeks. This daily lotion is best for dry skin, sensitive skin, and dry irritated skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultimate Relief for Dry Skin!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Vaseline Men's Healing Moisture Hand & Body Lotion for my husband, and it has quickly become a household favorite! If you're on the hunt for a fast-absorbing, effective solution for dry or cracked skin, look no further.First and foremost, the speed at which this lotion absorbs into the skin is impressive. No greasy residue, just instant relief. My husband, who is usually hesitant about using lotions, loves how this one doesn't leave a sticky or oily feeling. It's a game-changer for him, and I've noticed a significant improvement in the moisture levels of his skin.The healing properties are remarkable. His hands, which are prone to dryness and cracking, have become noticeably softer and smoother since using this lotion. The formula is gentle yet powerful, making it an ideal solution for daily use without causing any irritation.The subtle, masculine fragrance is another plus. It's not overpowering but leaves a fresh and clean scent that lingers just enough. The pump dispenser is practical and ensures that the lotion is dispensed in the right quantity, preventing unnecessary waste.The size of the bottle is generous, offering great value for the price. With daily use, the lotion has lasted longer than expected, proving that a little goes a long way. It has become a staple in my husband's grooming routine, and I can confidently say that his skin has never looked or felt better.In conclusion, Vaseline Men's Healing Moisture Hand & Body Lotion is a five-star product that delivers on its promises. If you're searching for a reliable, fast-absorbing lotion for dry or cracked skin, this is the one. My husband is a satisfied customer, and we'll definitely be repurchasing in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast absorption! Skin does not feel greasy after it drys.
reviews.reviewText: This lotion has a nice scent. I really like how it absorbs into your skin and doesn’t leave your skin with a greasy feeling. I put it on after a shower and my skin feels extra moisturized throughout the whole day. Great product. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good.. buy it!!!
reviews.reviewText: I rarely ever used lotion just because everything I've used in the past was always sticky or oily and results were minimalThis product however quickly absorbs into your skin and definitely works well which with much less mess and oil feeling after applicationThe scent is also enjoyable Not too overpowering and at the same time not two blandThe price is good. The results are good highly recommended product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The lotion doesn’t leave you oily feeling and for me, that’s a good thing, but my skin gets dry again in 3-4 hours. That’s not good enough for me. The scent is just ok to be. I had never smelled it before ordering it, so I won’t give a bad review for that.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my skin
Soaks into the skin quickly and doesn't feel greasy.
reviews.reviewText: The dispenser works well and the amount of product produced on a push can be controlled.My skin looked better the next morning with less flaking, itch and roughness. I love the fact thatyour clothes and sheets at night remain stain free. A very good value.

reviews.reviewTitle: The wife even uses this "men" body, face and hands lotion
reviews.reviewText: The wife says it feels so good on her skin and absorbs so quickly, she applies after her shower and by the time she is ready to dress, it is dry on her skin. Highly recommend to use for anybody.
Use this after show feels go smells good and is good.Great value for price

Con la temporada invernal he tenido serios problemas de resequedad en mi piel, sobre todo en mis manos y brazos, resequedad que las cremas solo alivian por un rato y despues vuelve la resequedad, la piel irritada e inclusive agrietamiento de la piel.Esta crema de Vaseline ha sido la unica entre una gran variedad de cremas corporales para hombre que he tenido la oportunidad de probar que ha humectado y resuelto mi resequedad de la piel, no se siente grasosa, se absorbe rapidamente y sobre todo mi piel permanece humectada por mas tiempo (si uno abusa de lavarse las manos seguido, obligatoriamente tendras que reaplicar la crema de nuevo, pero en condiciones normales no es necesario).En cuanto al aroma es gradable, no muy intenso y se disipa rapidamente, cosa que agradezco pues no me gustan las cremas con aromas persistentes.Compre la crema en linea porque lamentablemente ya no he visto que manejen esta linea en el supermercado donde la conseguia, y aunque es un poco mas cara la relacion costo/beneficio al no tener ardor y dolor en mis manos hizo que no dudara en comprarla.

reviews.reviewTitle: I don't love the smell on him. But he likes it
reviews.reviewText: He likes that it isn't greasy and it works well. It's a strong smell though. I'd like an unscented version better
